overview: Ken Shiro returns with another collection of Good Girls. Destiny Cruz and Maddy May compete to show a lover who is more extreme in Dirtier. Morgan Lee grooms Vanessa Sky to please her boss in Earned It. Haley Reed seduces her guest live on air in Tell Me Your Secrets. A shrewd older man sees through the games of his sons new girlfriend in Gold Digger. Each girl ultimately aims to please, and in that way, she succeeds.
title: Good Girls 2
